page.title: 18Fund Raising in St.Leonard's
page.content: In these days of cuts in spending in the Public Sector,education and like services have come to rely more and more on fund raising and sponsorship to provide money for many items of equipment etc.One way that is common is the Boot Sale.A charge of Â£5 is made for the use of a space for a car and the owner then sells his own goods from the boot.Fetes,raffles,jumble sales are also important ways of fund raising.Sponsoring is widely used.This entails getting a business to donate money for a specific object.In return the name of the firm is advertised e.g.on the jacket of a road crossing patrol.This all takes time.Some items thus paid for are videos,sports gear, swimming lessons,library books, curtains,mini-buses,computers and software and assistance towards outings etc.
